title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for three correct identifications for ALL three scales of analysis
descriptions: The response does not correctly identify all three of the following scales of analysis present in the graph data.
The response identifies ALL of the following scales of analysis present in the graph data.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct identification
descriptions:
The response does not correctly identify the following political entity shown in the graph data that has the highest gross national income (GNI).

· North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

The response correctly identifies the following political entity shown in the graph data that has the highest gross national income (GNI).

· North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct description
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe the concept of the sovereign country by stating any one of the following:
The response correctly describes the concept of the sovereign country by stating one of the following:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct description
descriptions:
The response does not correctly describe Germany’s composition as a federal state as follows:

· Germany has a national government that allocates control to state (Lander) and local governments within the country.

The response correctly describes Germany’s composition as a federal state as follows:

· Germany has a national government that allocates control to state (Lander) and local governments within the country.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct explanation
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain how the federal state has political advantages over the singular nation-state by stating any one of the following:
The response correctly explains how the federal state has political advantages over the singular nation-state by stating one of the following:

title: Part F
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct explanation
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain how membership in the European Union gives Germany a competitive advantage compared with the United States and China by stating any one of the following:
The response correctly explains how membership in the European Union gives Germany a competitive advantage compared with the United States and China by stating one of the following:

title: Part G
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct explanation
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain any one of the following possible disadvantages of membership in the European Union for a member state such as Germany.
The response correctly explains one of the following possible disadvantages of membership in the European Union for a member state such as Germany:
